metadata.dc:author: Llamazares Cachá, Gonzalo
Brotons Márquez, José Luis
Botella Almodóvar, Roberto
Alapont Alacreu, Jose Miguel
Herrero Polo, Enrique
García Arranz, Pilar
Andréu García, Angel
Schiefenbusch Munné, Enrique
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVES To report one case of right paratesticular rabdomyosarcoma in a 21-year-old young adult. METHODS After treatment with right radical orchiectomy through an inguinal incision it was classified as clinical group I A following the IRS-III (localized disease completely excised) and received adjuvant treatment with Vincristine and actinomicin D. RESULTS/CONCLUSIONS The patient is disease free 18 months after surgery. We emphasize the importance of adjuvant treatment in the posterior evolution of the tumoral disease.
metadata.dc:title: Rabdomiosarcoma paratesticular: a propósito de un caso en el adulto.
[Paratesticular rabdomyosarcoma: report of one case in an adult patient].
